txt.en: Wolf-weed can be found along the wood's edge north of Tighfield.\n\nCollect wolf-weed.
Henepa Twistknot needs help with a culinary conundrum.
Henepa Twistknot can be found tending bar at the The Elbow's Bend in the village of Tighfield.\n\nReturn to Henepa Twistknot.

'Thank you so much! You saved my week. See, I have a friend coming to visit from afar. Until now we've only exchanged letters. This is my first time meeting her in person, and I'm keen on making a good first impression.'

'Excuse me but could I ask you to pick some wolf-weed for me? None of the shops around here have any in stock, and I need it to cook some very special dishes. Why can't I get it myself? Because of the wolves, silly! I'm no slouch in a scrap but fighting wolves is not for me. If you find some, I'll gladly pay you for them.'

'Thank you so much! You saved my week. See, I have a friend coming to visit from afar. Until now we've only exchanged letters. This is my first time meeting her in person, and I'm keen on making a good first impression.'
